entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 12:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -39.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -43.3°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:11 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 41. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:11 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 60 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:11 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
